Normal working conditions ■ Ambient temperature : 5 ~ 40 °C ■ Relative humidity : ≤80% ■ Atmospheric pressure : 860 ~ 1060hPa Shipping environmental constraints transportation ■ Ambient temperature : -40 ~ 55 °C ■ Relative humidity : ≤ 95% ■ Atmospheric pressure : 500 ~ 1060hPa Special storage conditions, method of packaging devices.
